rules_text:
When Mistwood Rites enters, you gain 3 life.
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
{3}{U}{U}: Transform Mistwood Rites. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
Ward {3} [i](Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)[/i]
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, draw a card.
